author: ben.mesnik
title: Mobilize NFT groups via DAO tooling
description: NFTs offer an exciting new way to structure governance and access, but they're restrained by limited functionality.
solution: Fungify's NFT liquidity pools and governance contracts will enable exploration of novel governance models and empower NFT groups on Cardano.
experience: We're two first cohort Plutus Pioneers and Haskell developers with degrees in Computer Science
